item.description:
Dear Meditators - come join us at this mystical program about Mary Magdalene!

The Magdalene Circle
With Gloria Amendola
Saturday, May 4, 1-3:30   $40
Register: chalice444444@gmail.com
THE NEW ERA OF TIME: Navigating in a Post 2012 World!
During this afternoon intensive, we’ll take a look at what really happened on December 21, 2012. It wasn’t apocalypse and it wasn’t just another day. So what was it?
The Mayans made some profound statements about the course of events in this New Era. The astrology says we are in for change – and big change at that! And the numerology reveals that doorways were opened for us, but to where?
We will begin the day with a visual presentation on what was said by the Maya and other indigenous tribes, look at the four cycles of time that ended, and see what the prophecies are going forward.
We will drum in circle and journey. But before we do, I will scan everyone’s 7 major chakras by using a special pendulum to see where energy is flowing, and where it might be stalled. They key to being in flow with the new blending of cosmic and earth energies is to know where we are in harmony and where we may still be holding on to emotional conflict.
And since the force driving these changes astrologically is Venus, the divine feminine, we will work with the energies of Mary Magdalene, Mother Mary, Grandmother Anna, and all forms of the ancient goddess, to guide us by revealing our deeper purpose at this time. While working with the rhythmic Energy of Self through sound and breath, we will invoke the sacred symbols of these lineages and ask for Isis and Magdalene – and all the ancient lineages of women – to open us to our innate feminine powers. With our guides and guardians by our side, we will journey to the land beyond time, to understand how we can flourish at this time of transition and great change...and make a difference in our world!

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Mary Magdalene Circle with Gloria Amendola
